metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6187 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0, there is a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the do_pdf_save_document function in the pdf/pdf-write.c file. Remote attackers could leverage the vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
